# [FEAT] Custom Domains

## Labels
`customization`, `priority:low`

## Description
Implement custom domain support for help centers and agent workspaces.

## Requirements

### Help Center Domains
- Custom subdomain
- Custom root domain
- Domain mapping
- SSL certificates
- DNS configuration

### Domain Configuration
- Domain verification
- SSL provisioning
- Auto-renewal
- Domain aliases
- Redirect rules

### Multi-brand Domains
- Different domains per brand
- Brand detection by domain
- Domain-based routing
- SEO considerations

### Email Domains
- Custom sending domains
- SPF/DKIM/DMARC
- Domain authentication
- Reply-to domains

### Agent Access
- Custom agent portal domain
- Internal domains
- VPN compatibility
- IP restrictions

### Technical Requirements
- DNS record types (CNAME, A)
- Certificate management
- Domain health monitoring
- Failover handling

## Zendesk Reference
Zendesk supports custom domains for branded help center experiences.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Custom domain works
- [ ] SSL auto-provisioned
- [ ] Multi-brand domains
- [ ] Email domains configured
- [ ] DNS verification works
